thread.section_title: Art Hotel Congres - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good for budget hotel
thread.title_full: Good for budget hotel - Review of Art Hotel Congres, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: due_gundersen
title: Good for budget hotel
text: Great value for money. the staff was very friendly, the breakfast was ok. we booked a double bed but we got twin room that had the 2 beds pushed together, the beds kept on moving all night which was a bit annoying, the bathroom was super super clean and modern. the location is nice close to the metro. I do recommend it
